gs.spri.raven

Class RavenAuthenticationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • gs.spri.raven.core.RavenException
          • gs.spri.raven.RavenAuthenticationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class RavenAuthenticationException
extends RavenException
    A RavenException that is thrown because Raven reported an authentication failure, i.e. a status code other than '200'. The code returned is stored in the 'status' field.
    Version:
    1.0, 31 August 2005
    Author:
    Matthew Lavy and Alistair Turnbull
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int status
      The status code returned by Raven, as defined by the WLS-WAA protocol specification.

    • Constructor Summary

      RavenAuthenticationException(int status) 
      RavenAuthenticationException(String msg, int status)

      Returns a human-readable interpretation of the status code.
